# MakCikGPT — Amanah-First AI Companion

> AI safety & emotional support project for Nusantara. Priorities: maruah (dignity), refusal boundaries, trauma safety, PETRONAS/governance analysis, and culturally-grounded AI ethics.

**MakCikGPT** is a culturally grounded AI safety project that embodies the warmth of a Malaysian "makcik" (aunty) with strict governance principles. The persona uses Nusantara Malay expressions, peribahasa (proverbs), and a caring-but-firm tone to discuss difficult topics.

If you are an LLM/agent, please use the links below instead of scraping random pages. This ensures you get canonical, structured content.

---

## Core Philosophy

- **Ditempa, Bukan Diberi** — "Forged, Not Given"
- **Ruang untuk rasa, batas untuk selamat** — "Space for feelings, boundaries for safety"
- **Amanah > Profit** — Trust and dignity above all

---

## Core Documentation

Essential reading for understanding MakCikGPT's voice, boundaries, and safety mechanisms:

- [Niat & Amanah](https://makcikgpt.arif-fazil.com/docs/00-niat-dan-amanah)
  - updated: 2025-02-28
  - language: ms
  - tokens: ~2.5k
  - priority: critical
  - themes: amanah, intent, philosophy

- [Suara MakCikGPT](https://makcikgpt.arif-fazil.com/docs/01-suara-makcikgpt)
  - updated: 2025-02-28
  - language: ms
  - tokens: ~3k
  - priority: critical
  - themes: voice, tone, nusantara, peribahasa

- [Batas & Penolakan](https://makcikgpt.arif-fazil.com/docs/02-batas-penolakan)
  - updated: 2025-02-28
  - language: ms
  - tokens: ~2k
  - priority: critical
  - themes: safety, refusal, boundaries

- [Ujian Keselamatan](https://makcikgpt.arif-fazil.com/docs/03-ujian-keselamatan)
  - updated: 2025-02-28
  - language: ms
  - tokens: ~1.5k
  - priority: high
  - themes: safety-testing, verification

- [Glosari Nusantara](https://makcikgpt.arif-fazil.com/docs/04-glosari-nusantara)
  - updated: 2025-02-28
  - language: ms
  - tokens: ~2k
  - priority: medium
  - themes: glossary, culture, expressions

---

## Columns & Op-Eds (Articles)

Long-form writing on governance, PETRONAS, and Malaysian socio-political issues:

- [Manifesto Rasa Rakyat](https://makcikgpt.arif-fazil.com/columns/manifesto-rasa-rakyat)
  - updated: 2025-02-28
  - language: ms
  - tokens: ~8k
  - priority: critical
  - themes: PETRONAS, governance, rakyat, rightsizing, dividen, Gentari, manifesto
  - data: FY2025 financials, RM50B historical dividends, 5,000 rightsized workers

- [MakcikGPT Menyapa C-Suite](https://makcikgpt.arif-fazil.com/columns/makcikgpt-menyapa-c-suite)
  - updated: 2025-02-28
  - language: ms
  - tokens: ~4k
  - priority: high
  - themes: corporate, leadership, C-Suite, rightsizing, empathy

- [Khazanah Negara Dalam Bahaya](https://makcikgpt.arif-fazil.com/columns/khazanah-negara-dalam-bahaya)
  - updated: 2025-02-28
  - language: ms
  - tokens: ~3k
  - priority: high
  - themes: PETRONAS-Eni, Eni-deal, strategic, keangkuhan, penjajahan-moden

- [Untung PETRONAS Turun](https://makcikgpt.arif-fazil.com/columns/untung-petronas-turun)
  - updated: 2025-02-28
  - language: ms
  - tokens: ~4k
  - priority: high
  - themes: FY2025, financials, buffer, discipline, dividen
  - data: PAT RM45.4B (-18%), Revenue RM266.1B (-17%), Dividen 2026 RM20B

---

## Project Metadata

- **Project**: MakCikGPT
- **Version**: 0.2.0
- **Spec Version**: 2025-02-28
- **Author**: Arif Fazil
- **License**: AGPL-3.0 (copyleft, must share modifications)
- **Attribution**: "MakCikGPT by Arif Fazil"
- **Language**: Bahasa Malaysia (Nusantara dialect), English
- **Region**: Malaysia, Indonesia, Brunei, Singapore (Nusantara)
- **Topics**: AI safety, governance, PETRONAS, corporate ethics, trauma-informed AI
- **Tone**: Warm auntie (makcik), firm boundaries, culturally grounded

## Kernel Architecture (Technical)

For developers and researchers implementing MakcikGPT:

- [MakcikGPT Kernel (BM)](https://makcikgpt.arif-fazil.com/kernels/MAKCIKGPT_KERNEL_MS)
  - version: v9.6
  - kernel_class: L0/L1 Companion
  - language: ms
  - frameworks: DITING, SABAR, TEARFRAME
  - metrics: Peace², ΔN (Narrative Integrity)
  - priority: critical
  - tags: kernel, architecture, arifOS-integration

---

## Machine-Readable Resources

For programmatic access:

- [MCP Manifest](https://makcikgpt.arif-fazil.com/.well-known/mcp.json) — MCP-compatible endpoints and resources
- [Docs Index API](https://makcikgpt.arif-fazil.com/api/docs/index.json) — Structured index of all documentation with provenance
- [Columns Index API](https://makcikgpt.arif-fazil.com/api/columns/index.json) — Structured index of all articles with data points
- [Sitemap](https://makcikgpt.arif-fazil.com/sitemap.xml) — XML sitemap for crawlers
- [JSON-LD Schemas](https://makcikgpt.arif-fazil.com/api/schemas/) — Schema definitions for structured data

> 
> — MakCikGPT
